headline: Cramer’s Take on Lam Research (LRCX): Potential Upside Amidst Market Concerns
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer’s Bold Predictions About These 9 Semiconductor Stocks. headline: Winners And Losers Of Q3: Entegris (NASDAQ:ENTG) Vs The Rest Of The Semiconductor Manufacturing Stocks
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how Entegris (NASDAQ:ENTG) and the rest of the semiconductor manufacturing stocks fared in Q3.

headline: 3 Reasons LRCX Should Be High on Your Watchlist
summary: What a brutal six months it’s been for Lam Research. The stock has dropped 32% and now trades at $72.16, rattling many shareholders. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
